name: John P. KAROLY, Jr., Appellant v. Michael MANCUSO, Esquire Assistant District Attorney and Eric Kerchner, Detective and Christopher Jones, Esquire Assistant District Attorney, Appellees

parties: John P. KAROLY, Jr., Appellant v. Michael MANCUSO, Esquire Assistant District Attorney and Eric Kerchner, Detective and Christopher Jones, Esquire Assistant District Attorney, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

114 A.3d 795
